cards.name: Hoster Tully
cards.text: While Hoster Tully is participating in a challenge, each other participating House Tully character you control gains renown.
cards.flavor: Her father was growing weaker and more delirious with every passing day, waking only to mutter, "Tansy," and beg forgiveness.

cards.name: The Tumblestone
cards.text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After a House Tully character gains power, discard 1 gold from The Tumblestone to stand that character.

cards.name: Margaery Tyrell
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After a unique King or Lord character you control is killed, search your deck for a unique King or Lord character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)
cards.flavor: Margaery's kindness had been unfailing, and her presence changed everything.

cards.name: All Men Are Fools
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, each Lady character you control gains 1 power. (Max 1 per challenge.)
cards.flavor: "...but the ones in motley are more amusing than ones with crowns." <cite>The Queen of Thorns</cite>

cards.name: Eastwatch Carpenter
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you collect income, gain 1 gold for every 2 [thenightswatch] locations you control.
cards.flavor: Eastwatch was a better place to trade than Castle Black; that was where the ships came, laden with goods from the fabled lands beyond the sea.

cards.name: Eastwatch-by-the-Sea
cards.text: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, if you have a higher reserve value than an opponent, draw 1 card. +1 Reserve.

cards.name: Fickle Bannerman
cards.text: Bestow (2). Renown. Forced Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge, the winning opponent takes control of Fickle Bannerman unless you discard 1 gold from it.

cards.name: Storm's End
cards.text: Reaction: After you win dominance, discard 1 power from your faction card to choose 2 characters. Each of those characters gains 1 power.
cards.flavor: "There are spells woven into the stones. Dark walls that no shadow can pass â€” ancient, forgotten, yet still in place." <cite>Melisandre</cite>

cards.name: Stone Crows
cards.text: Ambush (3). Bestow (2). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Stone Crows is attacking, discard 1 gold from it to have the losing opponent choose and kill a defending character.

cards.name: Attack From the Mountains
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Clansman character, put a Clansman character into play from your hand.
cards.flavor: "The Blackfish was my Knight of the Gate, and since he left us the mountain clans are growing very bold." <cite>Lysa Arryn</cite>

cards.name: Drowned Disciple
cards.text: Reaction: After a character enters play from your dead pile, choose a Drowned God character and have it gain 1 power. (Limit twice per phase.)
cards.flavor: "Comforts I shall know in the Drowned God's watery halls beneath the waves." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>

cards.name: Moat Cailin
cards.text: While there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, reduce the initiative value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 3, and the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.

cards.name: Ghiscari Elite
cards.text: Reaction: After Ghiscari Elite is knelt, choose an attachment or event in your discard pile, and place it on the bottom of your deck.
cards.flavor: "Ours is the blood of ancient Ghis, whose empire was old when Valyria was yet a squalling child." <cite>Grazdan mo Eraz</cite>

cards.name: Slaver's Bay Port
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Slaver's Bay Port to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if an opponent has 4 or more characters in his or her dead pile.)

cards.name: Ricasso
cards.text: Bestow (2). You are considered to have X additional plot cards in your used pile. X is the number of gold Ricasso has.

cards.name: The Prince's Plan
cards.text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile and gains a challenge icon of your choice. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, pay 1 gold to return The Prince's Plan from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Ygritte
cards.text: Ygritte cannot be knelt by card effects. While you control another Wildling character, Ygritte gains stealth.

cards.name: Alliance
cards.text: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. You may run 2 Banner agendas in addition to this agenda.

cards.name: Barring the Gates
cards.text: Card abilities cannot cause characters to enter play.

cards.name: Late Summer Feast
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge, the losing opponent may draw 1 card.
